member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.FileManager
member.summary: Manages files in web application.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.FileManager.OpenFile(System.String,System.IO.FileAccess)
member.summary: Opens an existing file with specified access mode.
member.param: A relative or absolute path for the file.
A constant that determines how the file can be accessed.
member.returns: File stream.
member.exception: Thrown if file is NOT opened.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.FileManager.CloseFile(System.String,System.IO.FileAccess,System.IO.FileStream)
member.summary: Unlocks file after the file is closed.
member.param: A relative or absolute path for the file.
A constant that determines how the file can be accessed.
Stream to close.
member.exception: Thrown if file is not unlocked.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.FileManager.OpenFileTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout, in milliseconds, for method.
member.value: Default value is 100. Minimal value is 100, maximal value is 360000.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.CacheManager
member.summary: Manages viewer cache in web application.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.CacheManager.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Project directory.
Session identifier.
member.exception: Thrown if VintasoftWebControls_CacheDirectory key's value from Web.config missing or empty OR VintasoftWebControls_CacheLifeTime key's value from Web.config missing or empty OR projectDirectory or session is null or string.Empty.
Thrown if VintasoftWebControls_CacheLifeTime key's value from Web.config isn't int.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.CacheManager.GetThumbnailUrl(System.String,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Size)
member.summary: Returns URL to an image thumbnail.
member.param: Name of file in which image is stored.
Image index in image file.
Thumbnail size.
member.returns: URL to an image thumbnail.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.CacheManager.GetImageTileUrl(System.String,System.Int32,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.Size,System.Drawing.SizeF)
member.summary: Returns path to a tile of image.
member.param: Name of file in which image is stored.
Image index in image file.
Location of image tile.
Size of image tile.
Scale.
member.returns: Path to an image tile.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.CacheManager.DeleteOldCache
member.summary: Deletes old cache.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.CacheManager.ClearImageCache(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Clears the image cache.
member.param: Image filename.
Image index in file.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.CacheManager.CacheDirectory
member.summary: Gets a path to a directory where uploaded files and cached data must be stored.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.CacheManager.RenderedThumbnailsDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets a name of directory where rendered thumbnails must be stored.
member.exception: Thrown if value is null or string.Empty.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.CacheManager.RenderedImageTilesDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets a name of directory where rendered image tiles must be stored.
member.exception: Thrown if value is null or string.Empty.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.CacheManager.CacheLifeTime
member.summary: Gets a value that determines how long, in minutes, cached object will be stored on server.
member.remarks: Value of this property can be changed in web.config file.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether visual tool can respond to the user interaction.

member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS style of cursor of this tool.

member.summary: Gets or sets the cursor of this tool when action of tool is executing.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.UI.VisualTools.WebVisualTool.ActionButton
member.summary: Gets or sets the mouse button which executes the action of this tool
member.value:
Supported values: 1 (left mouse button), 2 (middle mouse button), 3 (right mouse button).
Default value is 1 (left mouse button).
member.exception: Thrown if value is not correct.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.UI.VisualTools.WebVisualTool.DisableContextMenu
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether context menu is shown when user presses the right mouse button and the right mouse button is set as an action button of the tool.

member.summary: Determines that visual tool is a child tool of the .
member.param: The visual tool to check.
member.returns: true if specified visual tool is a child tool of the composite visual tool; false if specified visual tool is not a child tool of the composite visual tool.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.UI.VisualTools.WebCompositeVisualTool.ActiveTool
member.summary: Gets or sets te active visual tool.
member.remarks: Composite visual tool draws the active visual tool over all other tools and sends mouse/keyboard events only to the active visual tool if active visual tool is specified.

member.summary: Gets the name of visual tool.

member.exception: Thrown if value is null.

member.summary: Gets or sets the appearance of the normal thumbnail.

- Background color: "#eeeeee"
- Background style: emoty string
- Border style: "1px solid #eeeeee"

- Border style: "2px solid #BAD2EB"

- Background style: emoty string
- Border style: "0px solid black"
